nodes.text: The CZR-9001 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol manufactured by Czerka Corporation available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Specific blasters were often designed for specific roles in combat.
The CZR-9001 blaster pistol first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an item that required reputation to purchase at CZ-198; it comes in numerous named variations with differing stats.
